errors.invalid-option:
invalid option
please enter a valid option!

first-run.ask-cheer:
Do you want to set motivational messages to cheer yourself while interacting with the app? (y/n)
==>
first-run.tell-max-phrases: okay! you can as set many as u want! this phrases will be displayed randomly
first-run.ask-cheers:
type here your phrases use ',' followed by a space to separate them
 example: 'you can!, i can!, i'm the best!
==>
first-run.no-cheers:
ok, you won't see any cheer phrases
you can add them later if you want!

choose-habits.query:
We have the following pre-built habits:
1. water
2. weight
3. exercise
4. meditation
5. reading
6. studying
7. mod
Enter 0 to select all, Enter 9 to skip and create your own
==>

menus.principal:
MENU
------------
track daily habits (1)
create new habit (2)
export csv (3)
see habit graphs (4)
exit (0)
